query.sql:
SELECT '本月开支' AS account_name, IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(dr_amount,0)-IFNULL(cr_amount,0)),0) as totalexp, 10 AS priority FROM exp_item i, exp_item_line l, exp_account a WHERE i.item_id = l.item_id AND i.period_id = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') AND a.account_type ='0' AND a.account_id = l.account_id
UNION
SELECT a.account_name, IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(dr_amount,0)-IFNULL(cr_amount,0)),0) as totalexp, a.priority FROM exp_item i, exp_item_line l, exp_account a WHERE i.item_id = l.item_id AND i.period_id = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') AND a.account_code IN('003','004','007','008') AND a.account_id = l.account_id GROUP BY l.account_id

query.name: getCurrentPeriod
query.sql: select p.period_id from exp_period p where p.period_id = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m')

sqls.executeSql: insert into exp_period( period_id, period_code, period_name, status, priority) values( ${@period_code}, ${@period_code}, ${@period_name}, "A", ${@period_code})
